author: RTÉ News
title: Drop in China's new coronavirus cases
description: China has reported a drop in new coronavirus infections for a fourth day as drastic curbs on international travellers reined in the number of imported cases.
content:
China has reported a drop in new coronavirus infections for a fourth day as drastic curbs on international travellers reined in the number of imported cases, while policymakers turned their efforts to healing the world's second-largest economy.
